column5: Ironically enough I went to T.O. last spring to see this guys boats. He was selling some kevlar canoes at a ridulously cheap price that he made with this mold. Let's just say I wasn't too impressed.
For a dollar I can see why...........  I guess he wasnt impressed either....
But will it produce something cheap enough ,that floats, that you don't care what happens to them on a back lake Mike?
Too bad I hate working with Glass... or I'd lay up a dozen or more and drop them from the air !!!
HAHAHAHAHA kinda gives me a flashback to the episode of WKRP when they dropped the Turkeys from the helicopter
Wayne would you? That would be awesome!!
